Reviews.Content: Complete Dump Filthy hotel. Has people living in their rooms like apartments. Lot's of unsavory people walking around at night. I saw drug deals going on and prostitution Security cameras all over the place, I felt so undase there that I checked out an hour later.The non-smoking room smelled like anything but smoking. The linen and carpets were filthy, as was the bathroom. I'm amazed Howard Johnson's keeps properties like this.
Reviews.Author: gregh3564

Reviews.Content: Got Stole Other than having to bear its unfriendly staff for one night we got stole. We paid the room in cash and surprisingly a week later when very far away I noticed that my credit card was also charged! In giving them the benefit of doubt I assumed it was a mistake an called to solve the situation. Contrary to my expectations they denied I paid in cash. Realising I could not do too much to force them to reimburse my money I threatened to post a review, their answer?: Do whatever you please!
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
